des: "A mixture of eggs, milk, vanilla and a pinch of salt is heated, then stirred together with bananas and vanilla wafer cookies for a slightly crunchy, fruity pudding."
ins: In large pot, combine eggs, milk, salt, vanilla, and flour.  Stir over low heat until mixture boils and thickens.  Remove from heat and stir in bananas and cookies.  Top with nutmeg and cinnamon to taste.  Serve.
